{
    "name": "The Lemaître–Tolman–Bondi metric, a general relativistic model for the expansion of the universe",
    "abbrev": "LemaîtreTolmanBondi",
    "description": "A spherically symmetric, dust-filled spacetime model that describes the expansion of the universe, used to study the evolution of the universe and the formation of structures within it",
    
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,

    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "Spherical",
            "xlineElement": "ds² = -dt² + (1 - 2M/r)dr² + r²(dθ² + sin(θ)^2*dφ²)",
            "validated": false,
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": ["christoffels", "ricci", "riemann", "einstein", "weyl", "g00", "infiniteRedShift", "horizons", "singularities", "limits"]
}[0m
